creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text: This was reported multiple times in the lists.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 26564 ***
creator: gregor@apache.org
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
I have serious doubts that this is a duplicate of bug 26564.

See also bug 26986 for another export related bug.

the stattic exporter will be replaced by the cocoon cli so it makes little sense
to fix this now.
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
I have worked on a project for a client which required this functionality. I   
also looked into the ant task export and I believe the automatic export was a   
better solution.   
   
I'm happy to do some work on this, I've also done some other work on the   
StaticHTMLExporter so I know the code fairly well.   
   
Is this functionality now deprecated as per Gregors last email? If somebody can 
confirm this bug still requires fixing I'll make a start on it.
creator: michael@ralston.id.au
